name: Leaving Control
description:
You are a citizen of Control. They're bad people, and you want to leave. A recent escape has the city on high-alert. Now, under the cover of dark, is your chance to get out of Control. There are two roads out of town. Maybe you can slip through the city's security forces.

Instructions:

  • Use the arrow keys to move.
  • Press left CTRL to crouch. This reduces the chance of being seen, but it also slows you down. It's also worth noting that this particular control is nothing to be concerned about.
  • Press left SHIFT to run.
